<div align="center">

<br /><br />

## 📥 Installation

1. ### 🚰 Tap this repo

   ```sh
   brew tap 5ouma/cask
   ```

1. ### 🥫 Install preferred applications

   - #### [◻️ Aseprite](https://www.aseprite.org)

     ```sh
     brew install aseprite
     ```

   - #### [🔄 FreeFileSync](https://freefilesync.org)

     ```sh
     brew install freefilesync
     ```
